entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:34 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -37.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 37.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 37. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34 with temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 34 with temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 55 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
